channel.title: Eclipse Problem
channel.description:
Eclipse problem, when I add in my source to eclipse (A Repackaged PI, done by me) it goes in as normal folders, and it doesn't has a default package and the folders are all weird. It doesn't show you the errors and it's being weird and I don't understand it.
Picture:
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/14dzqz4.png[/img]

item.title: Eclipse Problem
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

HcoJustin:

Right-click the project, go to properties. Under the settings for Java Build Path or whatever they name it, set src as a “Source Folder”

Thanks buddy, worked.

Read full topic

item.title: Eclipse Problem
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

Right-click the project, go to properties. Under the settings for Java Build Path or whatever they name it, set src as a “Source Folder”
